item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Timemap.org – Interactive Map of History (187 points | 41 comments)
2. A ChatGPT clone, in 3000 bytes of C, backed by GPT-2 (2023) (280 points | 101 comments)
3. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (612 points | 224 comments)
4. Certain names make ChatGPT grind to a halt, and we know why (178 points | 102 comments)
5. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (837 points | 423 comments)
6. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (341 points | 534 comments)
7. 12,419 days of Strandbeest evolution [video] (55 points | 5 comments)
8. Ham Radio All-in-One-Cable (144 points | 27 comments)
9. Infracost (YC W21) Is Hiring a Founding Solutions Engineer (Remote) ( | hide)
10. I'm daily driving Jujutsu, and maybe you should too (34 points | 9 comments)
11. QEMU with VirtIO GPU Vulkan Support (207 points | 40 comments)
12. PeerTube mobile app: discover videos while caring for your attention (403 points | 138 comments)
13. Review of Mullvad VPN (376 points | 141 comments)
14. OnlyFans models are using AI impersonators to keep up with their DMs (280 points | 363 comments)
15. The Cold Email Handbook (252 points | 130 comments)
16. The Marvelous Disappearing Capacitor (34 points | 6 comments)
17. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (232 points | 43 comments)
18. Dear OAuth Providers (279 points | 78 comments)
19. Tricking c64 basic into clearing a hi-res screen quickly (48 points | 14 comments)
20. The GPU is not always faster (169 points | 84 comments)
21. Evolving my ergonomic setup (or, my laptop with extra steps) (155 points | 82 comments)
22. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (114 points | 66 comments)
23. The Myth of Bananaland (142 points | 99 comments)
24. Geometry clipmaps: simple terrain rendering with level of detail (2017) (20 points | 1 comment)
25. Instant macOS install on Proxmox including AMD patches (150 points | 45 comments)
26. The report for the 2024 security audit of the Mullvad app is now available (13 points | 1 comment)
27. 2400 phone providers may be shut down by the FCC for failing to stop robocalls (357 points | 229 comments)
28. Dioxus 0.6 – Crossplatform apps with Rust (245 points | 98 comments)
29. RISC-V HiFive Premier P550 Development Boards with Ubuntu Now Available (153 points | 76 comments)
30. WPEngine, Inc. vs. Automattic– Order on Motion for Preliminary Injunction (367 points | 163 comments)
